name: nissan/ticketing-system
description: A simple PHP & MySQL ticketing system for Nissan, cloud-ready.

suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Required for S3 file uploads. Install with 'composer require aws/aws-sdk-php' if using S3.
suggest.spomky-labs/otphp: Required for TOTP 2FA. Install with 'composer require spomky-labs/otphp' if using 2FA.
